LanguageData.ASRG.label: advanced stirling radioisotope generator
LanguageData.ASRG.description: Produces 2500 Wd using refuellable uranium heat source attached to an advanced stirling engine. Will slowly heat up rooms it is placed in.
LanguageData.ASRG_Blueprint.label: advanced stirling radioisotope generator (blueprint)
LanguageData.ASRG_Frame.label: advanced stirling radioisotope generator (building)
LanguageData.ASRG_Frame.description: Produces 2500 Wd using refuellable uranium heat source attached to an advanced stirling engine. Will slowly heat up rooms it is placed in.
LanguageData.large_ASRG.label: large advanced stirling radioisotope generator
LanguageData.large_ASRG.description: Produces 9000 Wd using refuellable uranium heat source attached to an advanced stirling engine. Will heat up rooms twice as much as smaller version.
LanguageData.large_ASRG_Blueprint.label: large advanced stirling radioisotope generator (blueprint)
LanguageData.large_ASRG_Frame.label: large advanced stirling radioisotope generator (building)
LanguageData.large_ASRG_Frame.description: Produces 9000 Wd using refuellable uranium heat source attached to an advanced stirling engine. Will heat up rooms twice as much as smaller version.
LanguageData.sd_adv_powergen_adv_geothermal_generator: Produces electricity from geothermal steam geysers. Must be placed on a geyser.\n\nEnergy output: 7500 Wd
Produces electricity from geothermal steam geysers. Must be placed on a geyser.\n\nEnergy output: 7500 Wd
LanguageData.advanced_nuclear_generator.label: advanced nuclear generator
LanguageData.advanced_nuclear_generator.description: Produces electricity using an advanced stirling engine with refuellable uranium as the heat source. Plasteel is used as a rudimentary neutron reflector to superheat the fuel cask, improving power output and efficiency of the generator.\n\nEnergy Output: 26000 Wd
LanguageData.advanced_nuclear_generator_Frame.label: advanced nuclear generator (building)
LanguageData.advanced_nuclear_generator_Frame.descrip: Produces electricity using an advanced stirling engine with refuellable uranium as the heat source. Plasteel is used as a rudimentary neutron reflector to superheat the fuel cask, improving power output and efficiency of the generator.\n\nEnergy Output: 26000 Wd
